rdf:Description.dc:title: A report on the inspection of the Town of Lac La Biche 2005
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Cuff, George B.
Alberta. Alberta Municipal Affairs.
George B. Cuff & Associates Ltd.
rdf:Description.dc:publisher: [Edmonton, Alta.] : George B. Cuff & Associates Ltd.,
rdf:Description.dc:description: "The decision to conduct an independent examination ("Inspection") of the Town of Lac la Biche was made by the Minister of Municipal Affairs on August 23rd 2005. The consultant has spend approximately the past 12 weeks conducting the Inspection on behalf of the Minister."--p. 2.
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Municipal government
Municipal officials and employees
Mayors
